title: It's in the cards
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Electric apparatus and appliances - Safety measures
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Safety education, Industrial
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Electric apparatus and appliances - Safety measures
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Electrical injuries - Safety measures
Mathematics, Science & Technology/Electric apparatus and appliances - Safety measures
description: An industrial safety film for users of electical power machines. Teaches the importance and lifesaving value of "HOLD" cards. By putting this card on the main power switch of any machine, the repairman or worker assures himself that on-one will put the power on as long as the "HOLD" card hangs.
